name: InfluenzaTestsForInfluenzaAOrBVirusAntigen
title: Influenza (Tests for influenza A or B virus Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for test names to detect Influenza A or B antigen),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory test names),(Inclusion Criteria: Influenza virus A Ag or B Ag, where Scale is ordinal (e.g., tests for "presence")),(Exclusion Criteria: Panel or interpretation tests. Restuls where scale is other than ordinal (e.g., tests for "identifier", where Scale is nominal).)
